entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
